description.zh-cn: Paystack 是一个专注于非洲市场的支付处理平台，支持多种支付方式和货币。提供简单易用的API和强大的工具，帮助商家快速集成支付功能。
description.en: Paystack is a payment processing platform focused on the African market, supporting multiple payment methods and currencies. It provides an easy-to-use API and powerful tools to help merchants quickly integrate payment functionalities.
